Bien que perdue et en proie au doute, Hiro choisit pourtant de suivre la voie qu'avait empruntée sa sœur et de s’engager dans les forces amphibies de l’Académie Masakado, bien décidée à protéger l’humanité et à perpétuer son héritage."},"links":{"al":"182238","bw":"series/502042/list","mal":"170450","mu":"gl72kuy","raw":"https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/biggangan/introduction/mermaidgirls/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"e64f6742-c834-471d-8d72-dd51fc02b835","name":{"en":"Aliens"}}]}

After the deaths of her father and mother, Umeko plans to rearrange and renovate her parents' house, but she feels uneasy because of a series of unfortunate events, including the injury of her daughter at the family home. At that time, her best friend Akane, who works as a nurse at a large hospital, recommends feng shui to her. In fact, Akane was also impatient with the lack of progress in her relationship with her boyfriend and regularly used telephone fortune-telling. Umeko was skeptical at first, but after an accident, she decides to turn to a feng shui master. Following the feng shui master's advice, Umeko's life is filled with small fortunes, and as she becomes more and more addicted to feng shui, her excessive behavior begins to involve those around her. Hoshine, who has hidden her feelings for Eito since childhood, begins to feel uneasy: \n\n\"I’ve loved Eito for a much longer time!\"\n\n As a result, Hoshine starts to approach Eito even more, making bolder advances than ever before! She gets close to him in crowded trains and begs him to sleep by her side… While Eito tries to maintain his role as a formal servant, Hoshine increasingly pursues him with her advances. \n\nIt’s an adorable romantic comedy between a mistress and her servant, featuring a young lady who strives to win her servant’s love!","ja":"天堂家の超ハイスぺお嬢様・星音は、幼い頃からの使用人・影人に想いを寄せていた。ある日、影人が同級生の女子に告白されたのを聞いてしまい…その刹那! 天堂星音のすべて(知力・体力・財力・時の運に第六感?)を使った影人攻略が始まる―――。お嬢が一途にがんばる主従ラブコメ!","pt-br":"O servo da família Tendou, Eito, serve a jovem perfeita, Hoshine. Hoshine, que esconde seus sentimentos por Eito desde a infância, começa a se sentir inquieta: \"Eu amo o Eito há muito mais tempo!\" Como resultado, Hoshine começa a se aproximar ainda mais de Eito, fazendo avanços mais ousados do que nunca! Хошинэ, которая с детства таила в сердце свои чувства к Кагэто, чувствует себя неловко: \u0026quot;Я люблю Кагэто уже так давно!\u0026quot;\n\nВ порыве страсти, Хошинэ решает взять инициативу в свои руки. Mas, de alguma forma, sua amada irmã e o primeiro príncipe morrem em um acidente de carruagem e, depois disso, até mesmo seu agora noivo Lucian começa a agir de forma estranha. O possessor não foi executado no passado? Poderia \"Aridna\" ainda estar viva? Determinada a preencher o vazio deixado por seus entes queridos perdidos, Brinny se decide. Ela lutará contra o possessor."},"links":{"mu":"e3f5isi","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/64862103"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

E ele continua alheio às rivalidades silenciosas que estão se formando entre elas por causa da sua atenção.","vi":"Arata Itou có khả năng nhìn thấy trước vài phút trong tương lai, nhưng những hình ảnh cậu thấy luôn gắn liền với xui xẻo. Thế nhưng, cậu hoàn toàn không nhận ra rằng các cô gái ngày càng có tình cảm với mình. This is a pure love story that jumps across time!***\n\nMatsuri Shirai's fiancé cheated on her, and she couldn't dream of love anymore.\n\nThat was her situation when suddenly, a bearish man appeared in her bathroom at home. Matsuri slips and falls, losing consciousness. When she opens her eyes, a kimono-clad man and self-proclaimed ronin who calls himself Shuujurou Suou is cradling her in his arms. He tells Matsuri things like: in her past life, her name was Suma and she was the daughter of a samurai family, and that she was someone who committed lovers' suicide with him.\n\nNaturally, Matsuri was unable to believe such an absurd tale, and she gently tries to get him to leave. However, Suou points out that a scar on her pinky is proof that she has been reincarnated...?\n\n(Source: Pixiv Comic)\n\n---\n\n[CMOA](https://www.cmoa.jp/title/216381/)","ja":"【彼氏はアブナイ浪人さん！？時を越えた純愛物語。】――婚約者に浮気をされ、愛に夢を持てなくなった白井 茉李（しらい まつり）。そんな彼女の自宅の風呂場に、突如熊のような男が現れた。足を滑らせ気絶した茉李が目を覚ますと、自称浪人の蘇芳 柊寿郎（すおう しゅうじゅろう）という着物姿の男が自分を抱きかかえている。彼が言うには、茉李の前世が蘇芳と心中を果たした武家のお嬢さん朱茉（すま）なのだとか。そんな荒唐無稽な話もちろん信じられるわけがなく、どうにか穏便に出て行ってもらおうとする茉李。しかし蘇芳は、小指の傷が生まれ変わりの印と言い出して…？"},"links":{"al":"135239","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/gp/product/B09K36PF6W?ref_=dbs_p_pwh_rwt_cpsb_cl_1\u0026storeType=ebooks","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/622830/A002518389/","mu":"wgfc3lt","raw":"https://comic.pixiv.net/store/products/815172"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"92d6d951-ca5e-429c-ac78-451071cbf064","name":{"en":"Office Workers"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}
